item.description: Hi Members, Holliston Meadows asked me to change our next meetup to April 29th from 2-4 pm because April 15 is the first weekend of school vacation week and they are full in the kennel. They need our meetup room for the dogs staying there that week. School vacation week runs through April 22d, so we will meet on April 29th. I will charge $5 for this meet per household in order to pay the Meetup.com monthly dues for our groups. Free to members that are currently unemployed. Bring a chair. Small dog best, Kim

group.name: The Massachusetts Small Breed Dogs Meetup Group

item.name: Mass. Small Breed Dogs Meetup changed to April 29th 2-4 pm, Holliston Meadows
